info.author: Matthew Sital-Singh, Netsight Internet Solutions
info.description:
==========================================
plonetheme.netsightintranet Package Readme
==========================================

Overview
--------

This theme is a clean, simple theme for use on intranets in Plone. It is 
intended to be a modern replacement for the default skin, and a basis for further 
customisation.

Features
--------

* Edit toolbar is hidden by default, slides into view when clicked
* Add Item menu a 'lightbox' style pop up
* Clean, simple look
* Fits Plone's new logo/colours better

Compatibility
-------------

It has been tested on Plone 3.x, but not yet on Plone 4.


Changelog for plonetheme.netsightintranet

    (name of developer listed in brackets)

plonetheme.netsightintranet - 0.1 Unreleased

    - Initial package structure.
      [zopeskel]
info.name: plonetheme.netsightintranet
info.summary: A clean, intranet theme for Plone 3.0

Overview

This theme is a clean, simple theme for use on intranets in Plone. It is intended to be a modern replacement for the default skin, and a basis for further customisation.

Features

  • Edit toolbar is hidden by default, slides into view when clicked
  • Add Item menu a ‘lightbox’ style pop up
  • Clean, simple look
  • Fits Plone’s new logo/colours better

Compatibility

It has been tested on Plone 3.x, but not yet on Plone 4.
